listitem.para: Sometimes resizing the grid list view or changing the visible colums causes display glitches and parts of the screen show white. Resizing the window can help. We are looking at replacing our grid library with a more reliable one.
Some parts of the system are not yet migrated to the new design: documents, assessments, sending email, email templates and Quick Enrol are the major ones.
